评论详情: I ordered this last minute for a gala, but was also comfortable wearing out when we went for drinks after. It was better quality than I expected. The overlay has beautiful details. The slip dress is comfortable and flattering.

评论概述: Do not buy, Quality is terrible!
评论详情: This item came and was not worth the 62.00 it cost.  Came with a button missing.  The see through part is an overlay and not attached to dress and was a weird material that didn't hang well.  Doesn't look anything like the picture.  Returning as this is unusable.
I loved this dress. It was so cute and worked great for what I bought it for. It was made well and has held up. It was a great price. The size was accurate.
Love this dress. The fit was perfect for the occasion and very comfortable.

I loved the shape and color and style of the dress. It fit me perfect. However, the first time I actually wore it for an event, right before I had to conduct a concert, the dresses zipper completly came undone, and it was really stressful to have to troubleshoot pinning it together to make it work. Love the dress, but holy heck, the zipper needs to work for it to be functional.

评论概述: Cheap material, more like a Halloween costume than a dress
评论详情: I really wanted to like this dress, but I just couldn’t. It’s definitely not worth the price. The material is thin and cheap and not even hemmed. I felt like I was wearing a Halloween costume. It arrived badly wrinkled and smelled weird too. It took me more than half an hour to steam the wrinkles out. The dress photographs ok but I cannot imagine ever wearing this again. It should be at least twenty dollars less than what the listed price is for anyone that really wants to buy it.
I wore this to a wedding.
I love the dress it was how I expected but they gave me a medium when I ordered a extra large
The dress is rather snug, but it’s very cute and I love the design. Able to get the zip up the back by myself with minor difficulty
Absolutely gorgeous and great quality! Looks better than the picture!
I would size up for this dress
Cute little black dress. Perfect for a holiday cocktail party or wedding reception. Comfortable, flattering and easily accessorized for a more dressed up look.
What can I say this was perfect. Picture was exactly what we got, fit wonderfully, held together all night.
I love the way this dress looks on me. It is  flattering and I am very happy with the purchase! I am wearing a size medium.

I loved this dress but it accidentally got dried in the dryer by my son. I wore it to a wedding and everyone else thought it was so cute too I wish I got a better picture before the tragedy but the lesson is air dry the dress or it will melt.
Wanted to love this dress, but the whole time I had it on, the zipper was digging into my side and armpit, making it unbearable to wear. Back it goes!
This dress is light and cheaply made. I order an XL and normally wear Large but didn't want it too tight, but this wasn't able to zip.

The inner dress is not attached to the lace above the bust. This basically results in the top sliding down to provide a rather immodest view. The hemming is practically non-existent, just folded down and poorly ironed in place. Not worth any money.

I absolutely love this dress. Fits perfectly looks stunning the material is amazing. Easy to clean. I love it, so many compliments. Awesome for the price comfortable, stylish zipper was easy to reach didn’t stick or tear

I bought this dress for a gig that I was playing. I am a size small in most items. I ordered this in small. There was absolutely no give to the material. I returned for a medium, and had to wear it because I had no other choice, it was a themed event. It was the most uncomfortable Scratchy dress I ever worn. In the middle of dinner a button of the front popped off. The finish on the right sleeve didn’t have an embroidered edge like it’s matching counterpart.  I wish I could give this zero stars. Too late for a refund now…..

The quality of the dress was nice. The fit not great for me. I ordered an extra large which fit everywhere but the shoulders. It was so loose and awkward it was unwearable for me. 5’7” 188 for reference.
Poor stitching.

评论概述: Pretty but you get what you pay for
评论详情: The overall effect is pretty but close ups of the neckline and waistline show the super cheap construction. The dress length is just below the knees. I needed tea length, plus I could not wear something so poorly made to a family wedding It would be disrespectful.

评论概述: Cute, but not what I wanted
评论详情: I selected this dress for the long sleeves, but got this instead. It's still cute but now I'll have to buy something for my arms
I usually wear a XL or XXL. I ordered this dress in an XXL (and confirmed that's what the label said), and couldn't even get either piece of it over my shoulders.

When I got this dress delivered to me and tried it on for the first time LOVED the way it fit, even loved the style but when it came to the lace/tinsel on my skin didn’t really like it at all. It felt like sandpaper. I read a review on how to fix it and she said to steam it so I gave it a try. Sure enough the lace/tinsel feels ALOT smoother on my skin! I did notice how ever I got a tiny bit to close with my steamer and it made a tiny hole. I can saw it easy peasy but still it’s lace/tinsel and will burn through very easily. So if you are going to steam it be super careful on not getting to close!

This dress was exactly what I was looking for to fit the atmosphere of an Edgar Allan Poe speakeasy. This dress would be perfect for themed events or holidays. It has pockets which came in handy. Loved the keyhole in front. Fit is very comfortable but, definitely true to size so if you have larger breasts or a little extra belly fat, I recommend sizing up 1 size. The dress is comfortable but was a bit of a tight squeeze to zip in the torso area; which is why I mention the above. With that said, I didn't have help so I had to zip it up myself. Overall very pleased with my purchase. Recommend it!
Lovely fit..Great length...I wear a 12-14 dress...Size XXL was perfect ..no Alterations..
The actual black dress part is made out of some plastic/polyester, so it doesn't feel good on the skin. But aesthetically, the dress works and looks fine.

This dress was so gorgeous and I couldn’t have picked a better fit for my body. You WILL have to steam it! That way, it’s flowing and not so stiff to wear. The tulle can be very hard and the dress is covered with it. But, after the steaming, you’ll come away impressed with how it easily fits you like a glove!

The dress is really well made and holds it's shape, however the cut is strange. I didn't realize that the sleeve part goes over the outside of your shoulder, which makes it awkward to move your arms. Just not what I was looking for. The embroidery of the top part is really nice though.
Beautiful dress should have sized one up for me but fits my daughter pretty well and she loves it so at some point I will be buying one for me lol.

This dress was great. The only complaint I have about it, is the straps as you can't adjust them so they have the potential to fall depending on how the dress fits you.  Otherwise it was a great dress and would recommend it to everyone!
The embroidery was lovely but the fit was all wrong. The underdress was very short and the whole dress was way too small
I’m pear shape so the flare at the waist was super helpful. Good amount of stretch the top part is thin but the under part is made well and could be used for other studf

The delivery was fast. My daughter loves it. The quality is good 👍

The dress is not what it appears on the picture. It is not an a-line dress. The length of it is shorter as well as the sleeves. I ordered the dress for a wedding expecting to get what was on the picture and now it is too late for me to return it. This is very disappointing. I am very upset that now I don’t have the time to go and purchase a new dress because this was really what I wanted.

I ordered this in extra large. I'm a C cup and it was a little tight around the chest area. It felt like it would pop if I breathed wrong but it never did. I've worn it six times now and I really like how it fits. My best advice is to go an extra size than what you are so it's more comfortable. Otherwise, it was prefect in very other way, and the underlayer is very comfortable too! <3
Loved it! High quality, dreamy, elegant..

Dress is as pictured and I’m very happy with how it looks. I would suggest steaming it because it does look wrinkly at first. I will say that you definitely need to size up. I’m usually a L-XL in dresses and I ordered a XXL and it was a good fit. A little tight in the bust but I can get away with it because I don’t have much. Those with bigger busts: I’d recommend not to purchase this or you can get a slip dress to wear underneath because this dress surprisingly comes in 2 pieces. The under slip layer and then the top mesh layer. It also looked very flat compared to the picture when I first tried it on so I purchased a petticoat to wear underneath and that did the trick because now it looks perfect. Overall, I’m very satisfied with the dress and I can’t wait to wear it out this weekend.
I bought for Halloween! Perfect for my costume, beautiful dress.

Cute but a little bit tight on the top half, most likely you will need to size up. I usually wear a medium but I should have got a large. I felt like I had to be a contortionist to get into the dress, but once it was on it was cute, because of it being tight I would probably only wear this dress one more time, but because I’m already in the process of losing weight I kept it. I would suggest for anyone else to size up one though.
Weigh to small
unique, comfortabel, beautiful
Fits  In all the right places. I added a red belt and it looks wonderful.

I belong to a social club that holds theme parties about once a month. A couple of months ago the party was called “The Golden Age of Hollywood Glam Party”. I found this retro 1940’s style dress and bought all of the matching accessories I could find, including vintage seamed hose. The dress fit perfectly, and the quality is excellent. The dress and accessories easily survived hours of dancing the Boogie Woogie! So much fun! I can’t wait to wear it again! Oh, for an idea of the fit, I'm 5'5" and on a good day about 150 pounds.

评论概述: Beautiful dress but NOT true to size

May want to check true sizing for larger women as your scale online and what I received were not even close. If the sizing correction was made I might reconsider looking at this dress.
